content: worked over a simple 2 round repeat it s the perfect project for a relaxing evening in or a lazy sunday afternoon and if you fall in love with the process you can transform it into an endless afghan blanket make something simple and beautiful with your medium weight yarn 1 skein each in lettuce color a stone color b and true blue color c video tutorial available https //youtu be/wom6mzwq3tq https //youtu be/wom6mzwq3tq \> this pattern is available for free on \> my blog which is monetized by ads if \> you prefer an ad-free version of the \> pattern it is available to purchase \> right here on ravelry the premium \> version includes a stitch diagram ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
